subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Mark Wiebe became the 12th Champions Tour player to win in his first start on the 50-and-over circuit, leading wire to wire in the SAS Championship in Cary, N.C. Wiebe, a two-time winner on the PGA Tour, closed with a five-under 67 for a tournament-record 18-under 198.
